chapters.title: Chapter 46: Working Leather
chapters.info: Androl Genhald, p. 677—Leatherworker for the Asha'man in the Black Tower. He was originally blocked; he could only channel the One Power while holding a piece of leather. Taim beat his block out of him personally. He is the weakest of the Dedicated—he was only raised because Logain appealed directly to Rand and got him raised over Taim's express objections. His talent for Traveling is almost beyond belief; he can make gateways much larger than he should be able to make, given his strength. He has a faint Taraboner accent.
